metadata.title: CVE-2018-16421 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
Several buffer overflows when handling responses from a CAC Card incac_get_serial_nr_from_CUID in libopensc/card-cac.c in OpenSC before0.19.0-rc1 could be used by attackers able to supply crafted smartcards tocause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecifiedother impact.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16421` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

opensc - 0.19.0-1build1
opensc-pkcs11 - 0.19.0-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: opensc package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.19.0-1build1').
